remarks: Lemmma for ~ hdmap1l6 .  Part (6) in [Baer] p. 47 line 38. (Contributed by NM, 1-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmap1l6.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap1l6.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.

hdmap1l6.s $e |- .- = ( -g ` U ) $.

hdmap1l6.a $e |- .+b = ( +g ` C ) $.
hdmap1l6.r $e |- R = ( -g ` C ) $.
hdmap1l6.q $e |- Q = ( 0g ` C ) $.
hdmap1l6.l $e |- L = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
hdmap1l6.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1l6.i $e |- I = ( ( HDMap1 ` K ) ` W ) $.

hdmap1l6.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. D ) $.
hdmap1l6cl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.

hdmap1l6d.yz $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { Y } ) = ( N ` { Z } ) ) $.

hdmap1l6e $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` <. X , F , ( ( w .+ Y ) .+ Z ) >. ) = ( ( I ` <. X , F , ( w .+ Y ) >. ) .+b ( I ` <. X , F , Z >. ) ) ) $.
